name: Room of Roots
longDesc: This room hangs thick with moisture. Clearly you're deep underground, as the roots of the many trees descend from the jungle above and hang from the ceiling.
shortDesc: a room with walls made of thick, entwined roots

doors.name: steep cliff
doors.desc: a steep cliff lies to the west- the rope you used to descend still hangs here to enable your egress.

doors.name: slick stones
doors.desc: a path of water-slicked stones leads off to the east, towards the sound of a waterfall
